game.name: 蚀界档案
game.shortDescription: A dice-driven, Lovecraftian tactical RPG. Explore, solve mysteries, and battle on the strategic grid. Command your investigators between sanity and madness. Choose wisely—uncover the truth before the lurking madness consumes you.
